name: Forbes [Only Article Visible]
description:
This style for Forbes hides everything on the page except the article. This style sheet may not be for everyone.

Suggestion: enable this style when reading an article, disable the style when you are not.

If you have any comments / questions / suggestions, I would love to hear them email me at trails2thebest@gmail.com.
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("http://www.forbes.com/") {
.body.contains_vestpocket .vestpocket,
.gallery_embedded.dimensions_initialized.default_size,
.forbes_flyer.expanded.cycling,
.universal-footer,
.global.enable_sticky_header,
.top_link_strip,
aside,
.article_next_prev.next,
.related_searches,
.comment_bug,
#comments,
.article_actions,
.wp-caption,
.sponsorship,
.entity_block.followable_block.type_article_head,
hgroup h5,
hgroup h6

{display:none !important}

.fleft.clearfix, .article_head {width: 960px !important; margin: 20 auto !important}
}
